top_categories.workout_context: 100ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Gravel Medellín's Colombian mountains, South American gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 75 miles.
At Gravel Medellín, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
7,500ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Gravel Medellín's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before race day.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Gravel Medellín. Train it until it feels boring.
75 miles on colombian mountain gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
7,500ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Gravel Medellín, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Base fitness for Gravel Medellín. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on colombian mountain gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Gravel Medellín’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Gravel Medellín. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Gravel Medellín requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on colombian mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: colombian mountains, south american gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 75 miles of colombian mountain gravel in Medellín, Colombia.
